snippet: Even though profit was 11 percent lower than the same quarter last year, an analyst called the report “a very positive set of results.”
abstract: BP reports first-quarter profit of $4.2 billion, beating analysts' forecasts; overall net income for the period was $16.6 billion, including the sale of a 50% stake in its Russian affiliate TNK-BP, compared with $4.8 billion a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: Even though profit was 11 percent lower than the same quarter last year, an analyst called the report “a very positive set of results.”

headline.main: A Retrenched BP Tops Profit Forecasts
headline.print_headline: A Retrenched BP Tops Profit Forecasts
